website_summaries.verdict: The best copper farmhouse-style sink option for an elegant look at an affordable price.
pros: Thick copper metal resists impacts and scratches typically experienced during use
Handmade from 16 gauge pure solid copper
Sink will not turn green with typical indoor use
Front apron includes a hand embossed across design that creates a small focal point in the kitchen
cons: Sink requires some periodic cleaning and maintenance to keep the copper from discoloring

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I mean, WOW! Everyone who has stepped into my home has said, "That SINK! I mean, I love the rest of your kitchen, but...that SINK!" <3 Thank you for such an amazing, quality work!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: I found this sink for a very good price on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This sink is gorgeous. We just completed an extensive remodeling and I chose this sink. Others discouraged me not to get a copper sink but that's what I wanted. I found this sink for a very good price on Amazon. The installers were amazed at the beauty. Everyone that sees the sink love it. Everyone thins I paid over $1,000 for it. The best surprise when I read the enclosed booklet, the company that makes it is a non-profit organization, helping abused kids. I couldnt ask for better.
customer_reviews.author: Nadege Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Not at all worth the money
customer_reviews.text: We installed this sink only 2 weeks ago and it looks terrible already. I am very upset about over this, especially for how much I paid for it. It is stained and tarnished worse than anything i have ever seen. We have taken all the precautions to keep it in good shape and we have also bought copper cleaner and polisher and it hasn’t done anything for it. I can send a picture if needed. But please don’t waste your money on this item.
customer_reviews.author: Grass hopper

customer_reviews.title: WOW! best looking sink
customer_reviews.text: Received it yesterday. When I saw the box I panicked, the box was damaged on both sides. I even stopped and took pics of the box before I opened it. However, the sink did not have any damage at all. It was packaged really good on the inside to withstand that type of dents on the outside. It is more beautiful than pictures show. It is breathtaking. I can't wait to have it installed.
customer_reviews.author: Ileana

customer_reviews.title: Rich Copper Look
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this sink! It is beautiful and big. We waxed it to keep the fresh look longer. Paired with an oil rubbed bronze faucet and quartzite counters it looks like a million bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sink good quality very durable definitely worth the cost really sets off the kitchen
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: I like this thing because it's Unique and has the beautiful ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this thing because it's Unique and has the beautiful details on the front. You won't see everybody with this sink. It's a beautiful compliment to our kitchen and I'm glad we made the upgrade for such a price! I did not write it as a five-star simply because it's a copper sink and there is some upkeep to it.
customer_reviews.author: Carter

customer_reviews.title: I'm in absolute love with this sink
customer_reviews.text: I'm in absolute love with this sink! Can't wait till my kitchen is done so I can post a picture
customer_reviews.author: reese

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous copper sink!
customer_reviews.text: This sink is absolutely gorgeous! I’ve had it installed 2 years and while it does require maintenance, it’s well worth it. It’s the focal point of my kitchen and rarely does someone walk in the kitchen without complimenting me on the sink. It’s worth every penny. Be sure to research copper sinks before making the purchase. Invest in the mesh sink bottom and drain from Sinkology and purchase a good copper wax.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this sink!!
customer_reviews.text: I have finally installed the sink. I absolutely love the look of the sink and functionality is amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money easy to install
customer_reviews.text: We love the single basin, easy to clean very heavy duty
customer_reviews.author: travis burns

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sink
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful. We remodeled our kitchen and I wanted a farmhouse sink. This sink was perfect. We designed our kitchen around it as the scroll design sink is clearly the star.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Pettijohn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sink was delivered in perfect condition. It is beautiful and everything I wanted. Amazon had the best price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I just received the sink today the quality is great! I can’t say enough I’m so excited to finish my new kitchen, This sink looks so beautiful!!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Castillo

customer_reviews.title: it is so beautiful! Great quality and appearance
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is WOW,it is so beautiful! Great quality and appearance! It will look wonderful in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Lozano

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Was not even acceptable in the condition I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sink!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new sink. The front design is gorgeous. The size is perfection. I can not describe enough how much I love it. My sink did arrive damaged with little scratches and a small dent, but that is to be expected with such a soft metal product. Research copper and it's natural properties before you buy this sink. The natural color of copper changes... almost daily. It does need to be sealed with a caranuba wax, and it does need to be hand dried with a soft cloth occasionally to prevent verdigris. Again. Research copper before buying. Highly recommend, but that's just my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Honey

product_meta.title: Sinkology SK303-33SC Farmhouse Ganku Farmhouse Copper Sink 33 In. Single Bowl Copper Kitchen Sink with Scroll Design
product_meta.description: Introducing the ganku copper kitchen sink from Sinkology. This luxurious farmhouse kitchen sink features hand embossed scroll work on the front apron. Let this copper kitchen sink be the center piece of your kitchen, it is sure to impress. Artfully handcrafted from Pure solid copper and delicately hand embossed to create a functional work of art. The ganku kitchen sink is an inspiration for kitchen design, created to become the focal point in any kitchen ENVIRONMENT.
feature_bullets: Customize your ganku with heavy duty bottom grid SK303-33SC # sg001-33
Handcrafted and carefully hand embossed scroll detail
Handmade from 16 gauge Pure solid Copper
Sinkology Copper sinks will not turn Green with typical indoor use
Every sink is a unique work of art with meticulously hand embossing
